knimeNode.name: MS/MS Denoise Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters peaks from spectra which are not the most intense within windows of the MS/MS scans in the specified files.
knimeNode.fullDescription: Filters peaks from spectra which are not the most intense within windows of the MS/MS scans in the specified files.

ports.inPort: An input table with URLs or file locations for the input files in a single column
ports.outPort: A table in the chosen format for downstream nodes to process
